short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get your phone notifications on your PC

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get notified on your computer when someone messages, calls or when you get a new app notification on your android phone. Just download SynQ for android, scan the QR Code from the extension and you are good to go. Stay notified. Always.
